javadoc:
External manager interface. Defines methods for dealing with external programs and locations
 within those programs.

methods.javadoc: Returns a list of all external names for which locations have been defined.
methods.name: getExternalLibraryNames
methods.comment: Returns a list of all external names for which locations have been defined.

methods.name: getExternalLibrary
methods.comment: Get the Library which corresponds to the specified name

params.name: name
params.comment: name of library

return.comment: library or null if not found

methods.name: removeExternalLibrary
methods.comment: Removes external name if no associated ExternalLocation's exist

params.name: name
params.comment: external name

return.comment: true if removed, false if unable to due to associated locations/references

methods.javadoc:
Returns the file pathname associated with an external name.
 Null is returned if either the external name does not exist or
 a pathname has not been set.
@param libraryName external name
methods.name: getExternalLibraryPath
methods.comment:
Returns the file pathname associated with an external name.
 Null is returned if either the external name does not exist or
 a pathname has not been set.

params.name: libraryName
params.comment: external name

methods.name: setExternalPath
methods.comment: Sets the file pathname associated with an existing external name.

params.name: libraryName
params.comment: the name of the library to associate with a file.

params.name: pathname
params.comment: the path to the program to be associated with the library name.

params.name: userDefined
params.comment: true if the external path is being specified by the user

methods.name: updateExternalLibraryName
methods.comment: Change the name of an existing external name.

params.name: oldName
params.comment: the old name of the external library name.

params.name: newName
params.comment: the new name of the external library name.

params.name: source
params.comment: the source of this external library

methods.name: getExternalLocations
methods.comment:
Get an iterator over all external locations associated with the specified
 externalName.

params.name: libraryName
params.comment: the name of the library to get locations for

methods.name: getExternalLocations
methods.comment:
Get an iterator over all external locations which have been associated to
 the specified memory address

methods.name: getExternalLocation
methods.comment: Get an external location.

params.name: libraryName
params.comment: the name of the library for which to get an external location

params.name: label
params.comment: the name of the external location.

methods.name: getExternalLocation
methods.comment: Get an external location.

params.name: namespace
params.comment: the namespace containing the external label.

params.name: label
params.comment: the name of the external location.

methods.name: getExternalLocations
methods.comment: Returns a list of External Locations matching the given label name in the given Library.

params.name: libraryName
params.comment: the name of the library

params.name: label
params.comment: the name of the label

return.comment: a list of External Locations matching the given label name in the given Library.

methods.name: getExternalLocations
methods.comment: Returns a list of External Locations matching the given label name in the given Namespace.

params.name: label
params.comment: the name of the labels to search for.

return.comment: a list of External Locations matching the given label name in the given Namespace.

methods.name: getExternalLocation
methods.comment: Returns the external location associated with the given external symbol

params.name: symbol
params.comment: the external symbol.

methods.name: contains
methods.comment: Determines if the indicated external library name is being managed (exists).

params.name: libraryName
params.comment: the external library name

return.comment: true if the name is defined (whether it has a path or not).

methods.name: addExternalLibraryName
methods.comment: Adds a new external library name

params.name: name
params.comment: the new library name to add.

params.name: source
params.comment: the source of this external library

methods.name: addExtLocation
methods.comment:
Get or create an external location associated with an library/file named extName
 and the label within that file specified by extLabel

methods.name: addExtLocation
methods.comment: Get or create an external location in the indicated parent namespace with the specified name.

methods.name: addExtLocation
methods.comment: Get or create an external location in the indicated parent namespace with the specified name.

params.name: reuseExisting
params.comment:
if true, this will return an existing matching external
 location instead of creating a new one.

methods.name: addExtFunction
methods.comment:
Get or create an external location associated with an library/file named extName
 and the label within that file specified by extLabel

methods.name: addExtFunction
methods.comment:
Get or create an external function location associated with an library/file named extName
 and the label within that file specified by extLabel

throws.comment: if another non-Library namespace has the same name

methods.name: addExtFunction
methods.comment:
Get or create an external function location associated with an library/file named extName
 and the label within that file specified by extLabel

params.name: reuseExisting
params.comment:
if true, will return any existing matching location instead of
 creating a new one. If false, will prefer to create a new one as long as the specified
 address is not null and not used in an existing location.

throws.comment: if another non-Library namespace has the same name

name: ExternalManager
comment:
External manager interface. Defines methods for dealing with external programs and locations
 within those programs.
